value.code:
`
          w-[var(--icon-tray-width)] h-[var(--icon-tray-width)]
          flex items-center justify-center
          cursor-grab border-b border-[var(--border-primary)]
          bg-[var(--bg-secondary)]
          transition-all duration-150
          hover:bg-[var(--bg-hover)] hover:scale-105
          active:cursor-grabbing
          focus:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-inset focus-visible:ring-[var(--accent-primary)]
          [&>svg]:h-5 [&>svg]:w-5
          ${active ? `bg-[var(--bg-primary)] ${borderSide} ${activeBorder} text-[var(--accent-primary)]` : 'text-[var(--text-secondary)] hover:text-[var(--text-primary)]'}
          ${dragging ? 'opacity-50 scale-95' : ''}
          ${dragOver ? 'border-t-2 border-t-[var(--accent-primary)] bg-[var(--accent-hover)]' : ''}
        `

patterns.name: jsx_to_builder
patterns.description: Convert JSX element to VNode builder

patterns.name: onClick_to_message
